title: Apple promotes Music playlists and games for Brazil’s Carnival
content:
Brazil’s Carnival starts this Saturday. Although the traditional parties in São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro are not expected until April, due to COVID-19 cases rising, Apple is celebrating this holiday by promoting Apple Music playlists and games available on the App Store.

more…

The post Apple promotes Music playlists and games for Brazil’s Carnival appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is celebrating Brazil's Carnival by promoting Apple Music playlists and games available on the App Store. Check them out.
